table_caption: Baseline clinical and MRI characteristics of the total cohort and comparison of subgroups according to the median split of the cavitation index
table_foot: *Sum of periventricular (0–3) and deep (0–3) WMH scores#Available in 42 patients (n = 22 with cavitation index ≤ 7%; n = 20 with cavitation index > 7%)SD, standard deviation; NIHSS, National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale; FU, follow-up; RSSI, recent small subcortical infarct; PVS, perivascular spaces; IQR, interquartile range; ACE-R, Addenbrooke’s Cognitive Examination Revised
